body.h1: How to Create a Main Sequence
body.h2: Create Main Sequence using Developer Studio ESB Graphical Editor.
body.p: Main sequence is a special mediation configuration.The default main sequence will simply send a message without mediation. To create a main sequence using developer studio. Create a sequence named main. You can follow this guide to create sequence.During the creation process the only alter you have to do is give the sequence name as main. Wizard will create a main sequence with in sequence and out sequence as shown in below in the image.
